summary:
absence
-
Watching #CrimesOfGrindelwald made me remember how much I loved Harry Potter (and my OTP, H/Hr). 
For me, the period...
body:
absence

-

Watching #CrimesOfGrindelwald made me remember how much I loved Harry Potter (and my OTP, H/Hr).

For me, the period in Deathly Hallows wherein Ron leaves is an experience that makes their bond with each other even closer (and a missed opportunity for JKR, definitely).

I shipped them not because of the lazy ‘hero + heroine should get together’ argument. I really thought they understood each other well, were similar but different, mature with each other, etc. Real groundwork for a good relationship, and not just based on attraction and excitement. They really bring out the best in each other.

Oh well. They might not be canon, but they were compelling enough as a couple that JKR said they COULD have been. At least we got that dance scene in HP7.2 (thanks Yates)


Shipped them since I was ten until forever (also they give me major Newtina vibes huhu)

.


-

PROCESS:

Thought it’d be funny to use a British watercolor brand for this, so I used by Winsor & Newton 45s ☺️ + Daler Rowney paper, I think.

blog.name: made-of-more-bees
blog.title: Ａｌｗａｙｓ．
blog.description:
Nicole. She/Her. 28. Gay. MA. Slytherin. Candor. Very happily married.

Currently in an anorexia relapse; please blacklist #anorexia if this is triggering or stressful for you.

A chronic illness/mental health blog. Generally a total mess. Also cats. And Taylor Swift.

I'm doing the recovering thing as best I can. It's kind of the worst ever.

Asks are always open. Message me with questions or for advice or just to talk!

question: Grey and purple
answer:
Grey: Two facts about my favorite things

1. Cat purrs are scientifically proven to be medically beneficial, including helping bone health and promoting faster healing

2. Harry Potter stopped caring about Quidditch in HBP because he was too busy obsessing over Draco Malfoy.

Purple: Ten facts about my bedroom

1. There’s a window seat made of yarn bins with outdoor chair pillows and blankets covering them where my stuffed animals live.

2. There is so much more yarn than a casual observer might notice, and they’d notice a l o t.

3. My bed is adjustable and both the head and foot can be raised.

4. It can easily convert into a living room for flare days when I can’t get out of bed. The window seat gets stacked vertically, we bring the TV and Roku in from the actual living room, and up the bed. This has saved my life over the years.

5. It has an amazing walk-in closet that’s rivaled only by my sister’s.

6. My snakes live in my bedroom and despite what people like to say, they know me and greet me. Alexander especially will come out of his hide when I sit in front of his tank and we’ll talk through the glass. They are the most perfect snakes in the entire world and I love them so so much.

7. I’m super proud of my books bookshelf. I did a culling of books via the KonMari method and now instead of being so full of books I’ll never read I can’t take anything out, it only has my very favorite novels and also holds my knitting books, coloring books, and cookbooks.

8. The way my Madelinetosh Pashmina is on display in my yarn bookcase (my number one very favorite yarn ever).

9. If I sit on my bed, at least one cat will appear in no more than thirty seconds, unless there’s already a cat on the bed or I’m trying to give them medicine or take them to the vet.

10. There is no way a monster could be living under my bed because I use that space for storage (on purpose, I’m 27 and still get worried about monsters under the bed, but it’s impossible).

Bonus 11. It’s my safe space and I love it so much, my bedroom is the best

Thank you so much for asking!! What an excellent distraction ^_^

tags: it is too cold for an adventure
i saw Pepe la pew last night when i got into work and now i’m scared to leave the building.
we call our property skunk Pepe.
summary: Life on a resort night auditor during slow season.
body:
Life on a resort night auditor during slow season.

I finished my entire job in threeish hours…

1:30am “now I get to sit here for six hours and do nothing”

“Oh TikTok!” phone WiFi cuts out 👎

2am “stalk some tumblrs?”

3:25am “oh…. @asktheboywholived has 1346 pages to their tumblr.” Finger tapping on the table.

Now. 3:29 am……my brain is a gif repeating Sherlock shooting the wall shouting bored. My face pressed to the counter.

I even found a gif.

blog.name: theaveragegayboyfromillinois
blog.title: A blog for the Modern gay boy.
blog.description:
Hello everyone I am Cody (he/him/they/them).This is a blog where people can post and feel safe. So first things first, I am a 21 year old College student who is pansexual. I was raped and lived in a town where I was ousted via my preference to men. IT was a very Catholic town, and I am a very Gay me. 
Anyways, after coming out and going to college for a year I thought it would be like some Gay awakening, nope, I was wrong. I found out that other LGBTQA members were just as fascist as people who discriminate against us. 
Twinks, Bears, Jocks, MascforMasc, Fems, Pigs, Queens. Seriously we are suppose to be about unity not isolation, but all it seems is that there is a mess.
So, this blog goes out to all of the LGBTQA teens out there who feel like they have entered some kinda gay purgatory. This is to you, the people who don't fit the tropes and are kinda just THE AVERAGE GAY.

tags: bless this hot mess that is my life
body:
Fanboying out of control.

So I have recently found a group of amazing Harry Potter cosplayers and role players @actinganimagus & @jenlizrose . So not only do they cosplay Hinny and Jily perfectly, but their couple dynamic is just too damn cute.

Please if you like or love HP give them a lookout, they are amazing and do amazing work. They have resulted into my unabashed gushing and squealing over their art.

Thanks for coming to my TedTalk.

blog.name: jesuswasbatman
blog.title: Low content zone
blog.description: Mostly here to follow people, occasionally reblog

tags: can fandom talk about economic social justice for once
summary: Harry Potter star Rupert Grint in legal battle for £1m tax refund
title: Harry Potter star Rupert Grint in legal battle for £1m tax refund
excerpt: Harry Potter film star Rupert Grint is challenging a ruling denying him a £1 million tax refund. A tax tribunal previously rejected the actor’s appeal against an HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC) block on him using a change in accounting dates to shield his earnings from a higher tax rate. The 30-year-old, who is calculated to have earned around £24 million from playing the character Ron Weasley in the Potter film franchise, has now taken his legal battle to the Upper Tribunal in London. At a hearing on Wednesday, Mr Grint’s barrister Patrick Soares said the previous judge had applied the wrong legal test when deciding his case. In an August 2016 ruling, Judge Barbara Mosedale described how Mr Grint had followed advice from tax advisers Clay & Associates to change his accounting date so that 20 months of income would fall to be taxed in 2009-2010.
description:
Note to all Potter fans: Rupert Grint, two years after his first attempt failed, is going back to the courts to claim that he should be allowed to avoid a million pounds worth of tax through convoluted accountancy manouevers, while claiming not to care about money.

Can all readers please make sure that Grint literally trying to take money aware from the poor and sick becomes as well known on all social media networks as it would if he’d said something sexist or LGBT-phobic?

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them

summary: The Wizarding World is a dangerous place! The magical community in the United Kingdom has been fighting a threat from the...
caption:
The Wizarding World is a dangerous place!

The magical community in the United Kingdom has been fighting a threat from the shadows as the Dark Lord Voldemort grows ever more powerful. His followers, the Death Eaters, wreak havoc at his behest, striking fear into even the bravest of hearts. But there are those who refuse to give into the darkness. Albus Dumbledore, Headmaster of Hogwarts, leads the Order of the Phoenix, a secret society of courageous witches and wizards determined to battle back against Voldemort’s forces.

The First Wizarding War was never cut and dry, though. Each side comprised of more than simple heroes and villains. They were people, who lived and loved and fought and died. Each had a life and each had a story. What side will you pick and whose story will you tell?

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Our Most Wanted Characters include:

  • James Potter
  • Lily Potter
  • Bellatrix Lestrange
  • Amycus Carrow

And Many MORE!

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs

tags: 4am me is confusing ik leave me be
summary: I wonder if, in the scene where the Dursleys start to leave their home in the deathly hollows p1, how Dudly said ‘why do we have...
body:
I wonder if, in the scene where the Dursleys start to leave their home in the deathly hollows p1, how Dudly said ‘why do we have to leave’ and Vernon said ‘it’s not safe for us here anymore.’ And I can just assume that Harry told them to go. And then being them saying we will do no such thing. And Harry gives them this look. This look chances Petunias expression and softly walks over to Harry and puts a hand on his shoulder.

And she gives him a small nod and a small thumb rub on his shoulder. And she says that they should go somewhere.

When they’re about to start packing, even before Vernon can say anything to Harry, he walks over to them while they’re packing and he goes, “stay safe, I know that you would have just casted me away if you had the chance, so here’s you chance,” Harry gives off a small chuckle.

Before Vernon can say anything Harry cuts him off, “I’ll make sure the house is protected while your gone, don’t turn back for me, just go, and be safe.”

And this was the only time that Vernon truly gave a face that showed he actually cared for Harry, he walks over to him, and puts both his arms on Harry’s shoulders and hugs the boy. Startled Harry doesn’t know what to do. “Make sure you write to us after everything’s blown over.” As the hug finishes he looks at harry, “promise me you won’t die.”

Harry cannot assure that promise, so his expression doesn’t change, and Vernon knows he won’t be able to keep that promise.

When they start to drive off Dudley has his window down, and Harry decides to yell for him to hear “give them hell will you!?”

Dudley looks at harry for a moment, like a brother, and gives off a small grin yelling back out the window “I will.”
